answers.answer: You should ask your doctor. It could be diabetes/UTI etc. You won't know for sure unless you get tested. Good luck :)

Go see your doctor..constant thirst can be a sign of diabetes..have you have a glucose test? If not you should get one just to check...its nothing to be alarmed about either so dont panic but please go see your doc...good luck

question: I m 34 week pregnant.i feel very thirsty,anxious and sweat a lot for last few hours.there is no frequent urination like another day...  What is going on...is it safe??
title: feeling vry thirsty
